phrases: You saw my perfect body, did not you?!
I cannot believe that you of all people would see me stark naked!
I-I did not see anything, okay?
I mean, that place was pretty steamy!
You are telling the truth, right?
If you are lying, I swear!
Then what about that last thing?
What do you mean, that last thing?
If you do not get it, then never mind.
Of course I could never say it.
A night has passed since the incident in the women's bath.
You would better hurry, or they will run out of food.
She is surprisingly calm after yesterday's mess.
Was I the only one whose heart was racing, then?
Man, I was freaking out for nothing.
Why is my heart beating so fast?
By the way, Raku, have you heard about tonight's big event?
After we get back from the mountain, see, we will be holding our usual test of courage.
We are in high school now!
However, this is not an ordinary test of courage!
We are pairing up boys and girls with a drawing.
Each pair has to hold hands the whole time!
Does not that get you excited for tonight?
Would not it be great if you could pair up with Onodera?
I would never get that lucky!
If I happen to draw the ticket pairing me with Onodera, how much would you pay for it?
Who said I would buy it?
whatever you have to do, you would better make sure you pair up with Ichijou-kun!
But I thought it was through a drawing...
Use your willpower or something to make it happen!
Look, Kosaki, are you going to let this field trip pass without making any progress?
It does not matter what you do, but unless you take the initiative,
Did not you say that you were going to show more courage?
But if I happen to draw his ticket,
I am giving it to you, so your odds just doubled.
You would better pray that this works.
If you do pair up with him, all that is left is to overpower him in the dark!
If I really do get to pair up with him...
What will I do, I wonder?
Did you sleep well last night?
Hey, do not be late for assembly, Onodera!
I keep flashing back to those scenes from last night, and I cannot look her in the eye now!
We are beginning our annual test of courage!
Okay, we will be here having a drink,
so out of respect for our students' autonomy...
Well, just do whatever and have a good time, okay?
Oh, right, you are afraid of the dark.
Hey, will you be all right?
Do not cling to me the whole time, okay?
I-I will be fine, thank you!
It is not like I am going to be alone or anything.
I feel sorry for whoever gets stuck with you.
How strong's a gorilla's grip again?
Want me to test it out on your noggin?
All right, you are up next, boys!
At last, the moment where my life meets fate!
Do I get to pair up with Onodera, or not?
Come to think of it, what number did she draw?
Not that it will do me any good, but it would be nice to know.
Hey, so you drew a 12, huh, Kosaki?
I do not know what is going on, but now I know the number!
If I can just draw a 12...
I am counting on you, Raku!
I know it is a long shot anyway,
but just let me draw a 12!
Apparently, there are not enough boys, so I am playing one.
If you get scared, you are free to throw your arms around me, Kirisaki-san!
Well, I hear my grip is as powerful as a gorilla's.
On second thought, you can throw your arms around some nearby tree, Kirisaki-san!
Did I just exhaust a lifetime's supply of luck?
I am glad we are partners!
I still cannot look her in the eye!
Um, are you sure you are okay with me?
I was wondering if you are actually fine with me as your partner.
I mean, when I tried talking to you this morning...
Um, I was kind of wondering if you were avoiding me or something?
Spending the night in the same room as the girls...
That is all there is to it!
Sorry, that was a weird thing to say.
I was afraid that you hated me.
That face she is making is too cute!
Hey, do not be a dummy, Onodera!
Hey, luck is on my side, after all!
I am so going to savor this lucky time!
For God's sake, there is no way that I could ever hate you, Onodera!
He is paired with Kosaki-chan, huh?
Look at him fawning over her.
It is too late to look for a substitute.
Well, the thing is, one of the monsters got a stomachache.
So we are looking for a replacement, but so far we have had no luck.
Well, I am too scared of the dark.
I guess I will not be of any help.
Oh, man, what are we going to do?
Now that everyone is paired up, no one's going to want to be a monster.
We came up with so many ways to scare everybody too!
If we do not have enough people, the timing's going to be all messed up!
Rather, we did not have enough monsters to begin with!
At this rate, our test of courage is going to flop!
Oh, man, what are we going to do?
Thanks, you saved the night, Kirisaki-san!
Okay, we have to get to our spots right away, so follow me!
Basically, all you have to do is have a good time,'kay?
I have a light, everything's going to be okay.
Okay, I have to go over there,
so you scare'them good here, Kirisaki-san!
I am staying here by myself?
Were not you going to stay with me?
After all, I have got a light.
I might not be able to see them, but there are people all around me, so I am not sc...
For crying out loud, why do I have to go through this?
Is not there anyone who will save me now?
Why did he just pop into my head?
Why would he need to save me?
I might be just the tiniest bit scared.
I know that you have your good parts too.
Wait, I did not mean that in a weird way!
All right, want to get going, Onodera?
Oh, right, we are supposed to hold hands.
I can tell that Onodera is a little nervous too.
O-Okay, want to get going, Onodera?
All right, I have got to act cool for Onodera,
or I might never get a chance like this again!
Oh my God, I am a wreck right now!
This is not the first time I have done this,
but it is still making me nervous as hell!
My hand is as sweaty as hell!
Wh-What am I going to do?
I hope Onodera does not get creeped out!
I-I-It is not what you think, Onodera!
My heart is pounding so hard that...
Onodera's face is kind of red.
Do not tell me that she is nervous too.
Right when we were in the moment.
The thing is, she kind of disappeared on me a while ago.
Hey, if you are looking for Kirisaki-san,
I just saw her go into the woods.
I just heard this myself, but one of the monsters got a stomachache, so they asked her to be a ghost.
She is afraid of the dark!
Hey, hey, is everything all right?
A ghost should not be out in the open.
Did Kirisaki-san come back here, by any chance?
Well, you see, we asked Kirisaki-san to play a ghost,
but I forgot to change the batteries in her flashlight.
I thought I would give her new ones if she had noticed and came back here.
Without a flashlight, the woods are pretty much pitch black.
We are talking about Kirisaki-san here!
Of course you are worried, Ichijou-kun!
You are her boyfriend after all!
These woods actually are not that big, and it is not like there are any wild animals running around.
Yo, do not you want to see Kirisaki-san in a ghost costume?
Hell yeah, Kirisaki-san's so hot that I would bet she would look good in any costume!
What will you do if she is scares you?
If I get scared, I might just throw my arms around the ghost!
Moron, you want to get slugged?
Sure, if it is something she decided for herself, then she is probably okay.
I am scared out of my pants!
Oh jeez, how did I end up here, anyway?
I just want to go home!
Come to think of it, I went through something like this when I was a kid.
H-Hey, Tsugumi-san, are not you going to save...
I-I am a total mess when it comes to this kind of thing!
When I fell into the crevice...
Back then, I was so scared I could not even cry out.
All I could do was sob until I wore myself out.
But then, after some time, he came for me.
He always came for me when I...
Today, I was careless and fell inside a crevice in the rocks.
I cried because it was so dark and narrow,
and then he came to save me.
He always comes when I cry.
You are a ghost, so stop crying.
Man, do not try to do the impossible.
You tried to play a ghost when you clearly could not handle it.
But they were in a bind!
What was I supposed to do?
All you did was make everybody worry about you!
Try thinking about the consequences before you do something for once!
Then does that mean you did, too?
If you are tired, we can take a break anytime, so just
I said you can call me Chitoge!
Hey, you sure you are okay?
Do not tell me you have a fever.
Do not get any crazy ideas, now!
Last night, when we were in the bath, the girls told me.
We still call each other by our last names,
even though we have been dating for a while.
This is to make sure no one suspects us from here on out!
From now on, I am going to call you by your first name, so you would better do the same, all right?
She took me for a ride there.
That was pretty out-of-character for her.
Do you understand what that means?
I am not staring, damn it!
On our way back, we ended up getting lost,
and by the time we made it back, the Test of Courage had already ended.
In the end, I would squandered my chance to be alone with Onodera.
We were so worried about you!
I should have never let this happen to you!
You went after Chitoge-chan, did not you?
I even told you that I would be right back!
As long as Chitoge-chan is safe.
I cannot believe I blew my chance like that!
But at least Onodera forgave me.
What would you like to do about the day after tomorrow, the make-up holiday?
You said you wanted to visit the place where you met your first love.
We have no school the day after tomorrow, so I can make the arrangements right away.
I think I will pass, on second thought.
